body.p: By default, the JEuclid library is excluded from the Oxygen SDK artifact dependencies. To enable it, comment the following lines in the pom.xml file:<exclusion> <artifactId>jeuclid-core</artifactId> <groupId>net.sourceforge.jeuclid</groupId> </exclusion>

To edit specialized DITA Composite with MathML content, include the entire MathML2 framework directory (for example, the default location is: /frameworks/mathml2) in the frameworks bundled with the component in the bundle-frameworks module. This directory is used to solve references to MathML DTDs.
